column4: help: i need to free up some space, but deleting files does nothing. any ideas?
help: i need to free up some space, but deleting files does nothing. any ideas?
which files do you want to delete and how are you trying to delete them
miscelanous media files, hitting [del]  and going to the trashcan and emptying it
goto command line and try "rm -f filename"
well, they're not there anymore, because i emptied the trash.
it's safe to delete my .trashes , right?
sorry I don't know about the trash... if you rm the file it will be deleted.
think logging out then in will get rid of that ghost trash?
I don't think you deleted the files
well, i don't know what else could have happened
sounds like you just deleted pointers (shortcuts) which are only 1k files so it wouldn't save much space
it's obvious i didn't, but im not sure how to delete them now, considering that the trash got emptied and they're no longer there
you sure? these were files in ~/, that i put there.
i dont recall setting up any pointers
